gui.tantalumtweaks.compass.error: Error, you should never see this!
screen.tantalumtweaks.config.title: General
option.tantalumtweaks.config.light_level: Adjusts the size of the squares that render on each block.
option.tantalumtweaks.config.enable_smok: Makes any furnace block (Furnace, Blast Furnace and Smoker) emit more particles.
option.tantalumtweaks.config.compass_gap: The pixel gap between each coordinate and direction.
option.tantalumtweaks.config.durability_: Shows the item's durability on the tooltip. Shows tools effective durability with Unbreaking and flight time with Elytra's.
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.bad_omen: Causes an ominous event upon entering a village or the trial chambers
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.blindness: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.conduit_po: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.darkness: Adds a darkening affect to the players screen and black fog
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.fire_resis: Prevents the affected entity from taking any fire and lava damage
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.glowing: Outlines the affected entity even through blocks
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.haste: Increases attack speed by %s%% and mining speed by %s%%
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.hero_of_th: Gives %s%% discounts on trades with villagers, and villagers throw items at the player
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.hunger: Increases food exhaustion by %s per second
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.infested: Entities have a 10% chance to spawn 1-3 silverfish when hurt
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.invisibili: Affected entity is invisible and reduces other mobs' detection range
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.jump_boost: Increase jump height to %s, reduces fall damage by +%s♥
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.levitation: Entities float upwards at %s per second
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.luck: Increases chances of better and more loot from fishing and chests
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.mining_fat: Decreases attack speed by %s%% and mining speed by %s%%
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.nausea: Wobbles and warps the screen, and increasingly gets worse
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.night_visi: Lets the player see well in darkness and underwater
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.oozing: Makes the entity spawn 2 slimes upon death
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.poison: Inflicts %s♥ per second, doesn't affect undead. Damage is none lethal
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.raid_omen: Starts a raid at the location the player gained the Raid Omen, once the effect expires
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.saturation: Replenishes %s food and %s saturation each tick applied
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.slow_falli: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.trial_omen: Transforms nearby trial spawners into ominous trial spawners
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.unluck: Reduces chances of better and more loot from fishing and chests
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.water_brea: Prevents drowning and lets the affected entity breathe underwater
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.weaving: Affected entities spread cobweb blocks upon death
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.wind_charg: Affected entities emit a burst of wind upon death
tooltip.tantalumtweaks.effect.wither: Inflicts %s♥ per second, doesn't affect undead
